works.description:
The content of this page(http://djangoblog.org/django-community/django-project-file-structure/) is an article I wrote for my blog and there is not attribution to me, not mentioning of my name or any link to the original content.

This is the second claim I am writing against this website cause it is just stealing whole articles from a community feed. Is there a simpler way to mark the whole website as a content thief as this is going to continue forever.
